# Test that renaming of identifiers works

# For some reason this test triggers an unusual bug in Vim
# that causes it to segfault. For now we aren't going to bump
# the minimum required version for govim (or just the rename
# functionality) rather we just disable this test and we'll see
# if we get any reports of problems
[vim] [!vim:v8.1.1700] skip
[gvim] [!gvim:v8.1.1700] skip

vim ex 'e main.go'
errlogmatch -wait 30s 'PublishDiagnostics callback: &protocol.PublishDiagnosticsParams{\n\S+:\s+URI:\s+"file://'$WORK/main.go
vim ex 'call cursor(6,7)'
vim ex 'call execute(\"GOVIMRename banana\")'
vim ex 'silent noautocmd wall'
vim -indent call execute '["ls"]'
#stdout '"\n  1 %a   \\"main.go\\"                      line 7\n  2 #a   \"'$WORK/other.go'\" line 0"'
#! stderr .+
cmp main.go main.go.banana
cmp other.go other.go.banana

-- go.mod --
module mod.com

-- main.go --
package main

var i int

func main() {
	i += i + 5
	fmt.Printf("i: %v\n", i)
}
-- main.go.banana --
package main

var banana int

func main() {
	banana += banana + 5
	fmt.Printf("i: %v\n", banana)
}
-- other.go --
package main

func DoIt() {
	i = 6 + i
}
-- other.go.banana --
package main

func DoIt() {
	banana = 6 + banana
}
